title: Minestrone
steps: Cook pancetta in oil until rendered, 3-4 minutes.
Add onions, celery, carrot. Cook 8 minutes until softened.
Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add zucchini, cook 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes, broth, Parmesan rind. Simmer 30 minutes.
Add beans and pasta. Cook until pasta is al dente, 10 minutes.
Add kale, cook 2 minutes. Remove rind, stir in basil. Season to taste.
notes: Parmesan rind adds incredible umami depth.
Add pasta near end so it doesn't get mushy.
